title: Cultural Context Window Prioritizer
reason: We need this skill because global utility requires language and cultural context fidelity. This specific skill surfaces the most decision-relevant context under tight token budgets.
implementationGuide: Define the scope and success metrics for `Cultural Context Window Prioritizer`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to context mismatch and exclusion.
Design and version the input/output contract for language variants, cultural norms, and local preferences, then add schema validation and failure-mode handling.
Implement the core capability using importance scoring, and produce ranked context bundles with deterministic scoring.
Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover context mismatch and exclusion, then run regression baselines.
Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.

validationGates.check: All required input signals present and schema-valid

Approval gates satisfied before publish-level outputs

knownFailures.action: Reject payload, emit validation error, request corrected payload

Apply retry policy then rollback to last stable baseline
